name: Entrepreneurship & Self-Employment
description: Creating and managing your own business ventures to pursue passions and generate value.

subRoles.name: Startup Founder
subRoles.shortDescription: Creates and leads a new business venture to solve problems or meet market needs.
subRoles.longDescription: Startup founders identify market opportunities, develop business ideas, and create companies to bring their vision to life. They handle all aspects of building a business, from product development to fundraising to team building.

typicalDay: Morning standup with team to review priorities
Meet with investors or potential partners
dailyLife.workEnvironment: Co-working spaces, home offices, various locations

careerTrajectory.year1: Startup Founder - Validating idea and building MVP
careerTrajectory.year2: Startup Founder - Securing funding and growing team

subRoles.potential: Unlimited earning potential with high risk. Opportunity to create impact and pursue passions. Requires strong commitment and resilience.

education.preferred: Business degree or relevant industry experience

subRoles.name: Freelance Consultant
subRoles.shortDescription: Provides specialized expertise to businesses on a project basis.
subRoles.longDescription: Freelance consultants offer their professional expertise to businesses and individuals on a contract basis. They work in various fields such as management, technology, marketing, and finance.

subRoles.name: Small Business Owner
subRoles.shortDescription: Owns and operates a small business serving local or niche markets.
subRoles.longDescription: Small business owners create and manage businesses that serve specific markets or communities. They handle all aspects of running a business, from operations to marketing to finance.
